answers.answer: Hello nitramog,As you may know, we are volunteers and not medical professionals.  We cannot give specific information about dosing of any medication, so I urge you to ask your questions of your doctor because s/he will know your particular situation and health conditions.Our forum focuses on Type 1 (juvenile onset) diabetes and I can't tell from your message if you are Type 1 or Type 2.  If you are Type 2, then I encourage you to visit the ADA website that has many resources for folks with Type 2:  www.diabetes.orgI have also included a reliable FDA web site below that has general information about byetta.http://www.fda.gov/cder/drug/InfoSheets/patient/exenatidePIS.htmI hope this has been helpful for you.

question: information about byetta how are the side effects what have you seen  it seems good so far ?do you really skip a does if you've snacked recently?
title: information about byetta
